name: House M.D. - Episode 2: Blue Meanie
description:
Dr. Gregory House and his elite diagnostic team race against the clock to unravel an all-new medical mystery. An abrasive chef, whose body turns blue, learns what her employees really think of her. Track down the correct diagnosis by interviewing and examining the patient, running lab tests, searching locations and even performing surgery.

Features

• Join Dr. House and his elite diagnostic team.
• Race against the clock to solve a new medical mystery.
